nodes.text: The Star Wars 6-CD Hörspielbox: Episoden I-VI was a CD box set first released in 2006 that collected WortArt's six single-disc audio adaptations of the original and prequel trilogies. A second edition in redesigned packaging was issued on December 7, 2016. The box contains Die Dunkle Bedrohung, Angriff der Klonkrieger, Die Rache der Sith, Krieg der Sterne - Eine Neue Hoffnung, Das Imperium Schlägt Zurück, and Die Rückkehr Der Jedi-Ritter.
